analyses.title: Demographic Influence on Performance
analyses.context: Analyze how demographic factors such as gender and race/ethnicity influence students' academic performance.

sub_analyses.title: Gender Performance Comparison
sub_analyses.why: To determine if there is a performance gap between male and female students across different subjects.

sub_analyses.title: Ethnicity Performance Analysis
sub_analyses.why: To explore performance differences among racial/ethnic groups.

analyses.title: Parental Education Impact
analyses.context: Investigate how the level of parental education relates to student performance.

sub_analyses.title: Performance by Parental Education Level
sub_analyses.why: To understand if higher parental education correlates with better student scores.
answers: Average math score by parental education
Average reading score by parental education
Average writing score by parental education

analyses.title: Socio-economic Factors
analyses.context: Assess the influence of socio-economic indicators, such as lunch type, on academic outcomes.

sub_analyses.title: Lunch Type and Performance
sub_analyses.why: To investigate whether the type of lunch, as an indicator of socio-economic status, affects student performance.
answers: Average math score by lunch type
Average reading score by lunch type
Average writing score by lunch type

analyses.title: Test Preparation Role
analyses.context: Evaluate the impact of a test preparation course on students' scores.

sub_analyses.title: Effect of Test Preparation Course
sub_analyses.why: To analyze the effect of test preparation courses on students' academic performance.
answers: Average math score by test preparation course
Average reading score by test preparation course
Average writing score by test preparation course

analyses.title: General Performance Insights
analyses.context: Provide an overview of overall students' performance across subjects.

sub_analyses.title: Overall Math Score Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To understand the distribution and central tendency of students' math scores.

sub_analyses.title: Overall Reading Score Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To understand the distribution and central tendency of students' reading scores.

sub_analyses.title: Overall Writing Score Distribution
sub_analyses.why: To understand the distribution and central tendency of students' writing scores.
